name: Wheat
description: A cereal grain widely cultivated for its seed and used to produce flour for bread.

name: Barley
description: An ancient grain used for bread

name: Fig
description: A sweet fruit that grows on the ficus tree.

name: Pomegranate
description: A fruit with many seeds and a rich flavor.

name: Olive
description: A small fruit used for oil and pickling.

name: Date
description: A sweet fruit from the date palm tree grown in arid regions.
